list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: injury to body tissues caused by exposure to extreme cold, typically affecting the nose, fingers, or toes and sometimes resulting in gangrene.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: when they rescued him he was suffering from frostbite
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khi họ giải cứu anh ta, anh ta đang bị tê lạnh
